name: Stick Ink!
description:
Long long ago, two little students made a big mistake. They decided to participate in the 2018 summer Ludum Dare, and since then, they got stuck in their houses traumatized about all the things that happened and how quick was all.
Now, two years later, a friendo made it on getting them out of their houses, no one knows the secret yet. But few days after coming out, a huge pandemic stroke the world and they had to lock themselves again. In order to keep them alive, that friend proposed to participate again in the incoming Ludum Dare, because it was a good oportunity to fight that trauma, and this is the result of it.
After hours fixing infinite bugs and several issues, Stick Ink is released, a game where you control a stickman that his whole existance is fading, and is in your hand to keep it alive. You must fight and think, in order to survive the malicious enemies that are wanting to kick you off the world and to be able to solve the puzzles that will made you complete all the levels. Luckily, the ink gods are smiling to our little character and in the levels there are some divine ink pots that will give you more time after the inevitable death.

All the characters in this story are fictional and any similarity with the reality is mere coincidence

Controls

Move Right: D

Move Left: A

Jump : SPACE

Attack: Mouse Left Click

Climb Up Ladder: W

Climb Down Ladder: S

Gameplay
